CustomField.description: Stores certain statuses for " Form 1 Program Report Requirements (Heather's report)", enables status count on report.
CustomField.formula: CASE( General_Recruitment_Status_2__c, "Packet to HR - Part 1 Under Review", "Request to Post", "Job Post Date", "Posted", "Packet to HR - Part 1 Under Review", "Request for Applications", "Release Applications", "Applications Released", "Request to Hire Submitted", "Request to Hire", "CalHR - Approved", "Approved by CalHR", "HR Final Packet - Manager Approved", "Approved by HR Manager", "" )
CustomField.label: Review and Post Status
